member.name: P:ServiceStack.Mvc.ServiceStackController.UnauthorizedRedirectUrl
member.summary: Default redirct URL if [Authenticate] attribute doesn't permit access.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.Mvc.ServiceStackController.AuthenticationErrorResult
member.summary: To change the error result when authentication () fails. Override this property and return the appropriate result.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.Mvc.ServiceStackController.ForbiddenRedirectUrl
member.summary: Default redirct URL if Required Role or Permission attributes doesn't permit access.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.Mvc.ServiceStackController.ForbiddenErrorResult
member.summary: To change the error result when user doesn't have required role or permissions (). Override this property and return the appropriate result.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.Mvc.ServiceStackController.AuthorizationErrorResult
member.summary: To change the error result when authorization fails to something else, override this property and return the appropriate result.
